btrplace.solver.choco.view.ChocoView

    Package Description
    btrplace.solver.choco
    Choco implementation of a ReconfigurationAlgorithm.
    btrplace.solver.choco.view
    Choco implementation of the model views.

      Subinterfaces of ChocoView in btrplace.solver.choco.view 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  AliasedCumulatives
      An interface to specify a cumulatives constraint when a resource is shared among multiple nodes.
      interface  Cumulatives
      Interface to specify a multi-dimension cumulatives constraints.
      Classes in btrplace.solver.choco.view that implement ChocoView 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CPowerView
      A solver-side view to store variables that indicate the moment a node is powered on or off.
      class  CShareableResource
      Specify, for a given resource, the physical resource usage associated to each server, and the virtual resource usage consumed by each of the VMs they host.
      class  DefaultAliasedCumulatives
      Builder to create constraints where slices have to be placed on nodes with regards to the slice and the nodes capacity.
      class  DefaultCumulatives
      Builder to create a unique slices scheduler that aggregates different resources.
      class  DefaultPacking
      Default implementation that relies on the pack constraint bundled with Choco.
      class  Packing
      An abstract constraint to create vector packing constraints.
